CustomField.description: Used to create detail subscription records for Opportunities with the record type of "TravelClick" where the detail is not on the opportunity product line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to create detail subscription records for Opportunities with the record type of "TravelClick" where the detail is not on the opportunity product line. This name must match exactly, the data appearing in the Notes to Fulfillment area.
CustomField.label: Translation
